content: ■ FLL - Female Luer Lock - contains a tabbed hub for secure fitting to a threaded male luer lock.

■ MMFLL - Micro-Mate® Female Luer Lock - designed and manufactured to reduce the stripping of threads which occurs when metal adapters are mated with plastic male luer lock adapters. Uniquely designed to facilitate easy cleaning and maintenence.
■ MLL - Male Luer Lock - male luer slip with a threaded sheath for a secure fitting to a female luer lock.
■ ML - Male Luer - male luer slip that fits with a female luer.
